name: Meiro: Don't drop the light.
description:
A class project exercise in synthesis of interdependence in group interaction.  This game is a fantasy puzzle where players work together to solve mazes.  The stakes are high, and you will find that it is impossible to work alone.

Tip:

Hit space to exit controller tutorial.

Requirements:  PC/MAC with at least 3 game controllers

Minimum memory requirements: 1GB RAM

Reccomended Browser (for browser play): Firefox, Edge
